alert.note: Alert for Chambers (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 25 at 7:49PM CDT until June 26 at 3:00AM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM CDT FOR LEE...MACON...TALLAPOOSA...SOUTHWESTERN CHAMBERS AND RUSSELL COUNTIES... At 749 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Wind Creek State Park to near Fort Benning/lawson Army Air Fld, moving south at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Auburn, Phenix City, Opelika, Alexander City, Tuskegee, Tallassee, Dadeville, Camp Hill, Notasulga, Hurtsboro, Smiths, Smiths Station, Jacksons` Gap, Franklin, Waverly, Cusseta, Martin Dam, Beulah, Lake Tuskegee and Tuskegee National Forest. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
